column3: 2015 martha iglesias was born to roberto iglesias & martha e. cardoso on july 8
column4: 1970 in california and entered into eternal rest in norwalk
column7: martha worked as a loan officer in the finance industry. martha is survived by her loving parents: mother
column9: father roberto iglesias sr. & stepmother rosa iglesias both of whittier. she is also survived by her sister zeida maria garcia of fullerton and brother robert iglesias jr. south gate. condolences may be sent to her family through our website.
